PIN.values: |// INTEGRATIONMODE: Integrate postion by vector field&cr;&lf;// 0:Euler, 1:RK2, 2:RK4&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;//&cr;&lf;//&tab;&tab;3D Vector Field Function Class&cr;&lf;//&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;// VF3D START&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;// headers&cr;&lf;#ifndef FIELDS_FXH&cr;&lf;#include <packs\happy.fxh\fields.fxh>&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;#ifndef NOISE_FXH&cr;&lf;#include <packs\happy.fxh\noise.fxh>&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;// paramaters&cr;&lf;float noiseFreq : NOISEFREQ = 2; &cr;&lf;float noiseAmp : NOISEAMP = .1; &cr;&lf;float3 noiseOffset : NOISEOFFSET;&cr;&lf;&tab;&cr;&lf;// classes&cr;&lf;class cNoise3D : iVectorField3D &cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&tab;float3 Vector (float3 p)&cr;&lf;&tab;{&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;return perlinDFV(p * noiseFreq + noiseOffset) * noiseAmp;&lf;&tab;}&lf;};&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;//final function class instance&cr;&lf;cNoise3D VF3D; &cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;// VF3D END&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;uint threadCount;&cr;&lf;StructuredBuffer<float3> bPos <string uiname="Seed Position 3D Buffer";>;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;RWStructuredBuffer<float3> Output : BACKBUFFER;&cr;&lf;uint stepCount = 12;&cr;&lf;float stepSize = 0.01666;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;//GROUPSIZE&cr;&lf;[numthreads(64, 1, 1)]&cr;&lf;void CS_StreamLine( uint3 dtid : SV_DispatchThreadID )&cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&tab;if (dtid.x >= threadCount) { return; }&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&tab;Output[dtid.x] = bPos[dtid.x];&cr;&lf;&tab;float3 p = bPos[dtid.x];&cr;&lf;&tab;for (uint i = 0; i < stepCount; i++)&cr;&lf;&tab;{&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;uint index = dtid.x * stepCount + i;&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;p = integrate(VF3D, p, stepSize); &cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;Output[index] = p;&cr;&lf;&tab;}&cr;&lf;}&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;technique11 StreamLine&cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&tab;pass P0&cr;&lf;&tab;{&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;SetComputeShader( CompileShader( cs_5_0, CS_StreamLine() ) );&cr;&lf;&tab;}&cr;&lf;}&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;|

|// INTEGRATIONMODE: Integrate postion by vector field&cr;&lf;// 0:Euler, 1:RK2, 2:RK4&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;#ifndef FIELDS_FXH&cr;&lf;#include <packs\happy.fxh\fields.fxh>&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;//&cr;&lf;//&tab;&tab;3D Vector Field Function Class&cr;&lf;//&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;// VF3D START&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&tab;// placeholders for two input firld classes&cr;&lf;&tab;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;&tab;// INPUT1 START&cr;&lf;&tab;class cInput1 : iVectorField3D &cr;&lf;&tab;{&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;float3 Vector (float3 p)&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;{&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;&tab;return float3(.01,0,0);&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;}&cr;&lf;&tab;};&cr;&lf;&tab;cInput1 INPUT1;&cr;&lf;&tab;// INPUT2 END&cr;&lf;&tab;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;&tab;&cr;&lf;&tab;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;&tab;// INPUT2 START&cr;&lf;// paramaters&cr;&lf;float3 direction : DIRECTION = float3(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);&cr;&lf;&tab;&cr;&lf;// classes&cr;&lf;class cDirection3D : iVectorField3D &cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&tab;float3 Vector (float3 p)&cr;&lf;&tab;{&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;//return direction; // getting glitches???&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;return mad(p, .00001, direction);&cr;&lf;&tab;}&cr;&lf;};&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;//final field function class instance&cr;&lf;cDirection3D INPUT2; &cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;// INPUT2 END&cr;&lf;&tab;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;class cAdd : iVectorField3D &cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&tab;float3 Vector (float3 p)&cr;&lf;&tab;{&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;return INPUT1.Vector(p) + INPUT2.Vector(p);&cr;&lf;&tab;}&cr;&lf;};&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;//final field function class instance&cr;&lf;cAdd VF3D; &cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;// VF3D END&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;uint threadCount;&cr;&lf;StructuredBuffer<float3> bPos <string uiname="Seed Position 3D Buffer";>;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;RWStructuredBuffer<float3> Output : BACKBUFFER;&cr;&lf;uint stepCount = 12;&cr;&lf;float stepSize = 0.01666;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;//GROUPSIZE&cr;&lf;[numthreads(64, 1, 1)]&cr;&lf;void CS_StreamLine( uint3 dtid : SV_DispatchThreadID )&cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&tab;if (dtid.x >= threadCount) { return; }&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&tab;Output[dtid.x] = bPos[dtid.x];&cr;&lf;&tab;float3 p = bPos[dtid.x];&cr;&lf;&tab;for (uint i = 0; i < stepCount; i++)&cr;&lf;&tab;{&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;uint index = dtid.x * stepCount + i;&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;p = integrate(VF3D, p, stepSize); &cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;Output[index] = p;&cr;&lf;&tab;}&cr;&lf;}&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;technique11 StreamLine&cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&tab;pass P0&cr;&lf;&tab;{&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;SetComputeShader( CompileShader( cs_5_0, CS_StreamLine() ) );&cr;&lf;&tab;}&cr;&lf;}&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;|

|&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;//&cr;&lf;//&tab;&tab;Divergence Free Noise 3D Vector Field Function&cr;&lf;//&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;// This token will be replaced with function name via RegExpr: "fNoiseDFV_1_"&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;// ensures the function is defined only once per instance&cr;&lf;#ifndef fNoiseDFV_1_BODY &cr;&lf;#define fNoiseDFV_1_BODY&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;#define fNoiseDFV_1_NOISEBASIS perlinDFV&cr;&lf;#define fNoiseDFV_1_INFLECTION 0&cr;&lf;#ifndef fNoiseDFV_1_NOISEBASIS&cr;&lf;#define fNoiseDFV_1_NOISEBASIS perlinDFV&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;#ifndef fNoiseDFV_1_WORLEYOPTIONS&cr;&lf;#define fNoiseDFV_1_WORLEYOPTIONS&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;#ifndef NOISE_FXH&cr;&lf;#include <packs\happy.fxh\noise.fxh>&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;// parameters&cr;&lf;float3 fNoiseDFV_1_noiseFreq : fNoiseDFV_1_NOISEFREQ = 2; &cr;&lf;float3 fNoiseDFV_1_noiseAmp : fNoiseDFV_1_NOISEAMP = .1; &cr;&lf;float3 fNoiseDFV_1_noiseOffset : fNoiseDFV_1_NOISEOFFSET;&cr;&lf;float3 fNoiseDFV_1_center : fNoiseDFV_1_CENTER;&cr;&lf;&tab;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;float3 fNoiseDFV_1_ (float3 p)&cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&tab;return fNoiseDFV_1_NOISEBASIS(p * fNoiseDFV_1_noiseFreq + fNoiseDFV_1_noiseOffset fNoiseDFV_1_WORLEYOPTIONS) * fNoiseDFV_1_noiseAmp + fNoiseDFV_1_center;&cr;&lf;}&cr;&lf;// end of the function body&cr;&lf;#endif &cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;#ifndef fVectorOpV3D_1_INPUT1&cr;&lf;#define fVectorOpV3D_1_INPUT1 fNoiseDFV_1_&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;//&cr;&lf;//&tab;&tab;3D Vector Field Basic Ops Function + - * /&cr;&lf;//&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;// This token will be replaced with function name via RegExpr: "fVectorOpV3D_1_"&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;// ensures the function is defined only once per instance&cr;&lf;#ifndef fVectorOpV3D_1_BODY &cr;&lf;#define fVectorOpV3D_1_BODY&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;#define fVectorOpV3D_1_OP fVectorOpV3D_1_INPUT1(p) + fVectorOpV3D_1_INPUT2(p)&cr;&lf;#ifndef fVectorOpV3D_1_OP&cr;&lf;#define fVectorOpV3D_1_OP fVectorOpV3D_1_INPUT1(p) + fVectorOpV3D_1_INPUT2(p); &cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;// Parameters&cr;&lf;float3 fVectorOpV3D_1_Default : fVectorOpV3D_1_DEFAULT;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;// Input function VF3D placeholder&cr;&lf;#ifndef fVectorOpV3D_1_INPUT1&cr;&lf;#define fVectorOpV3D_1_INPUT1 normalize&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;// Input 2 Defualt option&cr;&lf;#ifndef fVectorOpV3D_1_INPUT2&cr;&lf;float3 fVectorOpV3D_1_singleVector (float3 p)&cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&tab;return fVectorOpV3D_1_Default; // if a second input class is not provided defualt to semantic&cr;&lf;}&cr;&lf;#define fVectorOpV3D_1_INPUT2 fVectorOpV3D_1_singleVector&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;float3 fVectorOpV3D_1_ (float3 p)&cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&tab;return fVectorOpV3D_1_OP; &cr;&lf;}&cr;&lf;// end of the function body&cr;&lf;#endif &cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;#ifndef VF3D&cr;&lf;#define VF3D fVectorOpV3D_1_&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;#ifndef CALC_FXH&cr;&lf;#include <packs\happy.fxh\calc.fxh>&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;#ifndef SBUFFER_FXH&cr;&lf;#include <packs\happy.fxh\sbuffer.fxh>&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;// vector field function placeholder&cr;&lf;#ifndef VF3D&cr;&lf;#define VF3D placeHolderV3&cr;&lf;#endif&cr;&lf;////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;uint threadCount;&cr;&lf;StructuredBuffer<float3> bPos <string uiname="Seed Position 3D Buffer";>;&cr;&lf;RWStructuredBuffer<float3> Output : BACKBUFFER;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;float stepSizeDefault = 0.01666;&cr;&lf;StructuredBuffer<float> stepSizeBuffer;&cr;&lf;float maxDist <string uiname="Maximum Distance from Seed Position";> = 5;&cr;&lf;float resetAll;&cr;&lf;StructuredBuffer<float> resetBuffer;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;//GROUPSIZE&cr;&lf;[numthreads(64, 1, 1)]&cr;&lf;void CS_SimpleAgent( uint3 dtid : SV_DispatchThreadID )&cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&tab;if (dtid.x >= threadCount) { return; }&cr;&lf;&tab;&cr;&lf;&tab;float reset = max(resetAll, resetBuffer[dtid.x % sbSize(resetBuffer)]);&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&tab;if (reset |||| maxDist < distance(Output[dtid.x], bPos[dtid.x])) &cr;&lf;&tab;{ Output[dtid.x] = bPos[dtid.x]; }&cr;&lf;&tab;&cr;&lf;&tab;float stepSize = sbLoad(stepSizeBuffer, stepSizeDefault, dtid.x);&cr;&lf;&tab;&cr;&lf;&tab;#if (INTEGRATIONMODE==1) &cr;&lf;&tab;calcRK2V3(VF3D, Output[dtid.x], stepSize);&cr;&lf;&tab;#elif (INTEGRATIONMODE==2) &cr;&lf;&tab;calcRK4V3(VF3D, Output[dtid.x], stepSize);&cr;&lf;&tab;#else &cr;&lf;&tab;calcEulerV3(VF3D, Output[dtid.x], stepSize);&cr;&lf;&tab;#endif&cr;&lf;}&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;technique11 SimpleAgent&cr;&lf;{&cr;&lf;&tab;pass P0&cr;&lf;&tab;{&cr;&lf;&tab;&tab;SetComputeShader( CompileShader( cs_5_0, CS_SimpleAgent() ) );&cr;&lf;&tab;}&cr;&lf;}&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;|

INFO.description: Given a starting point move an agent through a 3D vector field
